In v1 of Binance whitepaper, Binance said it would burn BNB based on Binance's profit. In v2, it said that it would burn BNB based on traded volume. Now, Binance says that it burns BNB "based on the number of trades performed on the exchange within a 3-months period"  https://t.co/LrWqeurBPG
